title.narrative: Adolescents mobilized and with increased knowledge and opportunities to participate in public forums of decision-making processes.

description.narrative: A total of 39,102 adolescents were engaged in life skills activities and decision-making public forums on their rights in three geographic areas affected by inequalities: The Semiarid, the Amazon and in low-income communities of large urban centers. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/02/2020
